headline: Why This 1 Momentum Stock Could Be a Great Addition to Your Portfolio
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: BD Launches New AI-enabled Solutions to Drive Connectivity Across Healthcare Settings
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a global leader in medical technology, introduces the BD Incada™ Connected Care Platform, a new scalable, AI-enabled, cloud-based platform that unifies BD device data into one intelligent ecosystem for the first time. The BD Incada™ Platform is available now with the launch of the next-generation BD Pyxis™ Pro Automated Medication Dispensing Solution, creating enterprise-wide visibility and connectivity that transforms data into actionable insight.

headline: Becton, Dickinson and Company: A Dividend Idea With Diverse Medtech Portfolio To Meet Future Demand
summary: Becton, Dickinson and Company announced some preliminary fiscal Q4 results recently. Read why I am reaffirming my prior buy rating on BDX stock.
